name: RSS Digest
description: Fetch, cache, and summarize RSS/Atom feeds. Provides rss_fetch tool and /rss command.

opmlUrl.description: URL to an OPML file containing RSS feed list

feeds.description: Manual list of RSS/Atom feed URLs (used if no opmlUrl)

cacheTtlMinutes.description: How long to cache fetched feeds (default: 60)

maxAgeHours.description: Only return posts newer than this many hours (default: 24)
